interpretation: The flag of Armenia represents the rich cultural heritage and national pride of the Armenian people. It is a symbol of their ongoing struggle for independence and the sacrifices made to achieve it. This card reminds us to be proud of our roots and to honor our ancestors who fought for our freedom. It also signifies a hard-won victory after a long and difficult struggle. This card encourages us to persevere through any challenges we may face, knowing that we too can overcome adversity and emerge victorious. The flag of Armenia is a reminder that our identity and heritage are powerful forces that can inspire us to achieve great things. This card calls us to embrace our unique cultural backgrounds and to use them as sources of strength and inspiration in our lives.
